name: Summer Athletics: The Ultimate Challenge
description: Summer Athletics offers multiplayer fun for the entire family and brings the action and excitement of the most popular summer sporting disciplines right into your living room! The charming 3D comic stule, varying levels of difficulty and intuitive controls will make Summer Athletics great fun for beginners and experts alike. Customize your character and develop your career as a professional athlete in career mode or challenge your friends in head-to-head competition.
